last_episode_to_air.name: Funky Cold Sabrina
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jeremiah pays tribute to his father. Rosanna's brother, Ray, gets arrested, and she and Johnny face an uncertain future. Fannie confesses her feelings to Daniel. After Sabrina gives birth, everyone comes together to meet Sabrina's baby.

name: Return to Amish
overview: The "Breaking Amish" cast are reunited in Pennsylvania, where Abe, Jeremiah, Rebecca and Sabrina are living, though Kate resides in New York City.

episodes.name: Home Is Where the Beef Is
episodes.overview: The "Breaking Amish" cast—Abe, Jeremiah, Kate, Rebecca and Sabrina—are together again in this reality series, which begins witha holiday dinner at Mary's that doesn't proceed as planned. Meanwhile, Andrew has a score to settle with Jeremiah after getting out of jail; Rebecca and Sabrina discuss their pregnancies; and Kate waits for news about an exciting opportunity.

episodes.name: Shunned & The City
episodes.overview: Mary takes a trip to New York City with Kate and Katie Ann, who's excited to meet one of the locals. Meanwhile, in Pennsylvania, Abe, Rebecca, Sabrina and Jeremiah discuss having babies and the practice of shunning; and Andrew and Chapel schedule an important appointment.

episodes.name: I’m Amish, What Are You?
episodes.overview: Mary argues with Chester about the church; the Schmuckers meet Abe and Rebecca's newborn baby; Sabrina experiences complications with her pregnancy.

episodes.name: Six More Weeks Of Winter
episodes.overview: Chapel gets sad news and tries to find a way to tell Andrew; Sabrina receives questionable advice; Mary and Jeremiah gauge interest in their new business idea at a Groundhog's Day festival; Kate focuses on her career in New York City.

episodes.name: Rebels Without a Claus
episodes.overview: An Old Christmas celebration brings the cast back to Pennsylvania. Meanwhile, Kate gets bad news about her internship; and dinner is interrupted by a confrontation between Jeremiah and Kate.

episodes.name: License to Wed
episodes.overview: Mary makes a decision about her future; Kate must prove herself at Fashion Week LA; the cast travels to Jeremiah's wedding and meets his fiancé; a wedding day mishap threatens the ceremony.

episodes.name: Mary With Children
episodes.overview: In the season premiere, Sabrina is in a new battle for custody of Oakley while dealing with her pregnancy; Jeremiah and Carmela plan to build a home in Florida; Rebecca wants to go back to school; and Mary learns sad news about her father

episodes.name: From Here to Maternity
episodes.overview: Tensions settle down as everyone makes up in Florida; Jeremiah and Carmela meet with a specialist to see if they're able to have a baby; Mary throws Sabrina a baby shower; Sabrina goes into labor a month early.

episodes.name: Chasing Raber
episodes.overview: Mary supports Sabrina at a custody hearing for her newborn baby; Carmela leaves Jeremiah after an explosive argument; Rebecca takes her GED test and is shocked by Abe's reaction.

episodes.name: Amish Pair-O-Dice
episodes.overview: Mary takes Jeremiah and Carmela to Las Vegas for the honeymoon they never had, but a fight between Abe and Jeremiah threatens the trip; Mary brings the family together for Jeremiah and Carmela's vow renewal; Rebecca and Sabrina come face to face.

episodes.name: Leaving Everything Behind
episodes.overview: Mary must decide if she will rejoin the Amish church. Jeremiah and Carmela make a risky decision to save their marriage. Sabrina must prove to Jeremiah that she’s changed. Shelly, Lowell, and Dawn decide to explore the English world.

episodes.name: Donut Season
episodes.overview: Jeremiah and Carmela introduce Lowell, Shelly and Dawn to the English world. Drama unfolds between Shelly and Lowell and threatens to ruin everyone’s time. Sabrina reacts to news of her father’s death. Mary wonders if the Amish community will welcome her back.

episodes.name: Sabrina's Surprise
episodes.overview: Lowell, Shelly and Dawn rebel against Jeremiah's rigid rules and explore the English world; Mary must find a way to please the Bishop; Sabrina tries to make things right with Jeremiah; Jeremiah's temper creates problems.

episodes.name: Jeremiah's Dark Past
episodes.overview: Jeremiah faces challenges as he opens his donut stand for the first time; Mary attends church for the first time since returning home; Shelly debates whether she should contact her biological mother; Dawn wonders about going home.

episodes.name: Going Full English
episodes.overview: Despite initial success with the donut stand, tensions mount between Jeremiah and Carmela; Lowell decides to get a makeover; Mary must confront an Amish woman speaking out against her to the Bishop; Sabrina works at the donut stand.

episodes.name: Forgive Me, Carmela
episodes.overview: Jeremiah makes a desperate plea for Carmela to return; Dawn and Shelly go full English; Lowell must make a difficult call to his Mennonite parents; Mary takes a risk that could threaten her standing in the Amish community; Sabrina says goodbye.

episodes.name: Stay Amish or Go English?
episodes.overview: Jeremiah and Ada must decide the future of their donut stand business; Mary learns her fate with the Amish Church; Shelly meets her biological mother; Lowell finds out surprising news about his baby during an ultrasound; Dawn reveals a dark secret.

episodes.name: No Turning Back
episodes.overview: Jeremiah, Carmela, Ada, Dawn, and Lowell gather for Shelly’s wedding; Shelly hopes that her Mennonite mother will come to her English wedding; Lowell and Lisa prepare for the unexpected arrival of their babies.

episodes.name: The Panic in Amish Park
episodes.overview: The pandemic has forced Jeremiah, Carmela, Ada and Sabrina to come together in Florida; Sabrina prepares for the arrival of her second child, while Jeremiah and Jethro must make peace; Rosanna and Maureen decide to leave their Amish communities.

episodes.name: The Past Isn’t the Past
episodes.overview: Ada takes Maureen and Rosanna to the ocean for the first time, but Rosanna contemplates returning to her Amish community; Jeremiah connects with his biological father; an unexpected guest threatens Sabrina and Jethro’s baby shower.

episodes.name: The Time Has Come
episodes.overview: While questioning his own father’s legitimacy, Jeremiah discusses having a baby with Carmela; Maureen and Rosanna are in awe of the rich English; Sabrina is afraid something is wrong with the baby, and she must head to the hospital alone.

episodes.name: The DNA Test Request
episodes.overview: After hours alone in labor, Sabrina must have an emergency C-section; Roseanna has had enough of hearing about Maureen’s new beau; still having doubts about his biological father, Jeremiah asks Dennis to take a DNA test.

episodes.name: The Truth About Jeremiah's Dad
episodes.overview: Jeremiah learns the truth about his father. Rosanna and Maureen buy their first bathing suits, but then they learn…

episodes.name: The Most Awkward First Kiss Ever
episodes.overview: While out with new friends, Rosanna gets asked out on a date. Maureen has her first kiss, but she has reservations about going further. Jeremiah meets his biological cousin. Jethro walks out on Sabrina and their kids.

episodes.name: The Black Sheep
episodes.overview: After a night of passion with Daniel, Maureen worries about an abnormal itch. Sabrina and Jethro have an emotional face-off. Jeremiah meets his biological cousin. Roseanna goes on her first date.

episodes.name: The Family Resemblance
episodes.overview: Maureen and Rosanna must decide to go English or stay Amish. Jeremiah comes face-to-face with his biological cousins for the first time. While Sabrina is trying to salvage her relationship with Jethro, others are slower to absolve him of his sins.

episodes.name: The Last Time You See Your Family
episodes.overview: Maureen's Amish parents deliver a blow, but she feels support from new love Daniel. Rosanna realizes that her decision to leave the Amish community will affect everyone in her family. Sabrina wrestles with whether Jethro will fall back into his old ways.

episodes.name: The English Makeover
episodes.overview: Ada throws a party to celebrate Maureen and Rosanna's English makeovers. When Jeremiah reveals he wants to be a father, Carmela's answer could make or break their marriage. Sabrina and Jethro try to fix their relationship, but a secret changes everything.

episodes.name: Karma Carmela Chameleon
episodes.overview: While Ada hopes Maureen will join her in Florida, Jeremiah and Carmela get away from the stress of baby-making. Rosanna must choose between her Amish boyfriend or the English life, and Jethro has left Sabrina while she is pregnant with their third child.

episodes.name: Daniel, My Brother
episodes.overview: Johnny panics when he goes to an English nightclub for the first time, and Jeremiah and Carmela help Sabrina with a medical scare. Daniel makes a date with an English girl, and Kenneth arrives in Florida to pursue his dreams of playing basketball.

episodes.name: Fannie, Are You OK?
episodes.overview: Jethro comes back to make amends with Sabrina. Kenneth tests his basketball skills. Rosanna's older brother learns about her sleeping arrangements. Facing being shunned, Fannie flees to Florida only to be dropped in the middle of more drama.

episodes.name: Come On, Maureen
episodes.overview: Rosanna's brother furiously accuses Ada of eroding the Amish values in the house. Jeremiah wants to apologize to Dennis, Fannie has a traumatic beach experience, Maureen confides in Sabrina, and Johnny becomes angry when Rosanna models a bikini in public.

episodes.name: Meet You All the Way, Rosanna Rosanna
episodes.overview: Rosanna desperately tries to persuade Johnny to stay in the English world. Kenneth faces a harsh reality about his dream. Ada finds romance in an unlikely place. Maureen makes a shocking decision. Ray and Daniel make a bet that leaves Fannie in tears.

episodes.name: Smooth Oper-Ada
episodes.overview: Daniel brings home an English girl, and Fannie is heartbroken. Ada makes a sudden announcement that she's leaving. Johnny's fear about partying at the house leads to a blowout physical fight between him and Ray.

episodes.name: Johnny B. Goode
episodes.overview: The Amish girls get a lesson in Brazilian bikini waxing. Sabrina and Jeremiah confront the new Amish about making bad decisions. Johnny tells Rosanna she must choose between him and English world.

episodes.name: What's The Frequency, Kenneth?
episodes.overview: Daniel, Kenneth and Fannie get their English makeovers. Jethro proposes to Sabrina. Back at home, Rosanna and Johnny make a surprising discovery and must get the blessing of their Bishop to marry.

episodes.name: Jeremiah Was A Bullfrog
episodes.overview: Kenneth, Daniel and Fannie reveal their decision on whether they will go English or stay Amish to their families. Jeremiah meets his biological grandmother. Johnny and Rosanna risk everything to help Fannie. Sabrina is rushed to the hospital.

episodes.name: Funky Cold Sabrina
episodes.overview: Jeremiah pays tribute to his father. Rosanna's brother, Ray, gets arrested, and she and Johnny face an uncertain future. Fannie confesses her feelings to Daniel. After Sabrina gives birth, everyone comes together to meet Sabrina's baby.
